short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and beautiful note-taking extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Notes is a simple and elegant note-taking Chrome extension designed to help you capture thoughts, ideas, and reminders instantly. With its minimalist design, Quick Notes provides a distraction-free space for your notes, allowing you to focus on what matters. Itâ€™s perfect for jotting down quick to-dos, meeting notes, or even inspiration on the go. The easy-to-use interface ensures quick and seamless note-taking, with a one-click save button to securely store your notes. Your notes are saved persistently, so they remain even after you close the browser. Lightweight and responsive, Quick Notes offers a smooth experience, making it an ideal companion for students, professionals, and creatives looking to capture ideas right within their browser.
